contentrichtext.text: '''Ozawa''' (小沢 or 小澤) is a [[Japanese name|Japanese]] [[surname]]. It may refer to: * [[Eitaro Ozawa]] (1909-1988), Japanese actor * [[Ichirō Ozawa]] (born 1942), Japanese politician * [[Hideaki Ozawa]] (born 1974), Japanese football goalkeeper * [[Jisaburō Ozawa]] (1886-1966), Japanese admiral and last Commander-in-Chief of the Combined Fleet during World War II * [[Juri Osada]] (née Ozawa), Japanese figure skater and coach * [[Kenji Ozawa]] (born 1968), Japanese musician, nephew of Seiji Ozawa * [[Madoka Ozawa]] (born 1978), Japanese adult video actress * [[Michihiro Ozawa]] (born 1932), Japanese former football player * [[Maria Ozawa]] (born 1986), Japanese adult video actress * [[Naho Ozawa]] (born 1983), Japanese retired adult video actress * [[Ryota Ozawa]] (born 1988), Japanese actor * [[Sakihito Ozawa]] (born 1954), Japanese politician * [[Seiji Ozawa]] (born 1935), Japanese conductor * [[Terutomo Ozawa]], Japanese economist * [[Tsukasa Ozawa]] (born 1988), Japanese football player * [[Yuki Ozawa]] (born 1983), Japanese football player {{surname}} [[Category:Japanese-language surnames]]
